item.description:
It's that time of year again...time to dust off those bowling balls and head over to Metro Bowl.

Let's go out and have a good time bowling to great tunes, having fun and see who is the most rusty from our Summer break.

 

Please remember to bring the Meetup cell phone number (978-304-2811) so that if you are running late, can't find us or need to cancel at the last minute.

Also, please check to see if you owe dues for this year on your profile page.  If you do owe for the year, please plan on paying the organizers at this event.  If you have paid for this year, we thank you.

 

Hope to see you all at Metro Bowl

Donna & Janet
item.name: Glow Bowling @ Metro Bowl
